    • Uses of RendererPlugin in org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.page.renderer

      Classes in org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.page.renderer that implement RendererPlugin 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ContentHighlightRendererPlugin
      Highlights a content object if the mouse is hovering over it.
      class  ContentSelectionRendererPlugin
      Renderer plug-in for document page view that highlights the selected content objects with a surrounding rectangle.
      class  PageContentRendererPlugin
      Renderer plug-in for document page view that draws the content objects (outline + fill).
      class  SelectionFocusRendererPlugin
      Page view rendering layer that greys out the area around the currently selected page object.
      Methods in org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.page.renderer with parameters of type RendererPlugin 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PageRenderer.addPlugin(RendererPlugin plugin)
      Add renderer plug-in (layer)
      void PageRenderer.removePlugin(RendererPlugin plugin)

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  PageViewTool
      A tool for interacting with the document page view.
      Classes in org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.page.tool.drawing that implement RendererPlugin 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasePageViewTool
      Base class for tools that can be used with the page view class.
      class  EditOutlineTool
      Tool for adding, moving and deleting polygon points for a page content object.
      class  RectangleTool
      Tool that allows drawing a rectangle on the document.
